Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with major delays near Belmont due to a stalled train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with major delays near Belmont due to a stalled train.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Belmont to Kimball in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these bus routes:

  • #77 Belmont
  • #22 Clark
  • #8 Halsted
  • #81 Lawrence
  • #80 Irving Park
  • #78 Montrose
  • #152 Addison

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 87th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing with major delays near 87th/Dan Ryan due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing with major delays near 87th/Dan Ryan due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses were requested from Garfield to 954th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
